definition: mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable
coke (processed coal used in blast furnace)
lit. to send charcoal in snowy weather (idiom)/fig. to provide help in sb's hour of need
people are in a terrible situation (idiom)

sentences.english: The results obtained from the experiments show that the most favorable decoloring agent is powder active carbon.
sentences.chinese: 实验表明，粉状炭作为脱色剂具有更大的优越性。

sentences.english: Love, and the same charcoal, burning, need to find ways to askcooling.
sentences.chinese: 爱，和炭相同，烧起来，得想办法叫它冷却。

sentences.english: In order to obtain self-dispersal nano carbon black pigment.
sentences.chinese: 为了获得一种具有良好自分散性能的纳米炭黑色浆。

sentences.english: The carbon black dispersion for aqueous ink was prepared by sand mill.
sentences.chinese: 通过砂磨分散研制了配制水性墨水用的水性炭黑色浆。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To prepare hydrophilic carbon black (HCB) and investigate its lymphatic targeting property.
sentences.chinese: 目的制备亲水性纳米炭并研究其淋巴靶向性。
炭被用作许多气体的滤器。

sentences.english: ObjectiveTo provide the basis of the technological standardization of Rubia cordifolia L.
sentences.chinese: 目的为茜草炭炮制工艺的优化提供依据。

sentences.english: The effects of the different amounts of Pd C catalyst on the hydrogenation of raw lacquer were investigated.
sentences.chinese: 研究了不同用量的钯炭催化剂对生漆催化氢化的影响。

sentences.english: It is made by roasting an entire pig with seasoning in a charcoal furnace at high temperature.
sentences.chinese: 它是由烘焙一整头猪，慢慢拌入调味料炭在高温下炉。

sentences.english: When ferrocene was used alone. , Fe-encapsulated carbon nanoparticles were the main product.
sentences.chinese: 单独使用二茂铁时，产物为球状炭包裹铁纳米颗粒。

sentences.english: Our Grand Pacific Heritage Red is a perfect complement to Barbeque Pork Spare Ribs and Beef Stir Fry.
sentences.chinese: 罗斯福酒园加州红是炭烤猪排以及煎牛排的绝佳搭配。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE Study on the best processing degree of carbonized catnip.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨荆芥炭的最佳炮制程度。

sentences.english: Can Charcoal Slow Climate Change and Improve Agriculture?
sentences.chinese: 炭可以减缓气候变化并改善农业生产？

sentences.english: Free flame is charcoal with fierce fire.
sentences.chinese: 活火，是炭有焰，其火势生猛。

sentences.english: He took off her head and shoulders in charcoal.
sentences.chinese: 他用炭笔画她的半身像。

sentences.english: Ecological effect of peat and weathered coal on alkali-saline soil.
sentences.chinese: 草炭与风化炭改良盐碱土的生态效应。

definition: to manufacture charcoal/to burn charcoal (often a reference to suicide by carbon monoxide poisoning)
to burn/to cook/to stew/to bake/to roast/to heat/to boil (tea, water etc)/fever/to run a temperature/(coll.) to let things go to one's head
